div.p: TO BE THERE. MORE DETAILS ON ALL THE SHOWS ON
BILLO’REILLY.COM. THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY,
REPORTS ARE THAT FRED PHELPS IS NEAR DEATH.
THE LOATHSOME PREACHER WHO FUNDED THE WESTBORO BAPTIST
HATER. >> GOD IS DEALING WITH THIS
NATION IN HIS WRATH, HE APOINTED OSAMA BIN LADEN AND MANY MORE
LIKE HIM TO DESTROY THIS LAND. THE NATION’S OF THE WORLD HATE
ON THE WATCH OF THE LYING WHORE FALSE PRPHETS OF THIS SO CALLED
>> FOR THOSE WHO BELIEVE IN AN AFTER LIFE, MR. PHELPS MAY HAVE
SOME EXPLAINING TO DO. ONLY GOD IS TO RENDER JUDGMENT
AND WE ARE TO LOVE OUR NEIGHBOR. I’M NOT JUDGING PHELPS, I’M JUST
OPINING HE MAY HAVE A PROBLEM. REDEMPTION IS ALWAYS POSSIBLE.
THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE
